oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Music Is Fun - 1953-mm-28 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Music Is Fun, part 2. Originally broadcast 28 (month unknown, either February, March, or November), 1953. Host Sidney Dalton talks with Nashville public school students and plays excerpts of classical recordings, with announcer Grant Turner.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Sidney Dalton discusses Wolf-Ferrari's Dance Of The Cammorists and Rimsky-Korsakov's Dance Of The Buffoons [continued from part 1] -- Dance Of The Cammorists (recording, excerpt) -- Dance Of The Buffoons (recording, excerpt) -- Sidney Dalton discusses Beethoven's Symphony No. 5 -- Symphony No. 5 (recording, excerpt) -- Closing statement (Sidney Dalton) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Music is fun (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Dalton, Sidney
